definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: I started walking down an unfamiliar road. There was not a soul there.
sentences.chinese: 我開始沿着一條不熟悉的道路前行，連個人影都沒有。

sentences.english: I'm driving collectively a country roadvertising oned I'm completely lost.
sentences.chinese: 我開車順着一條鄉下小路前行，我一經全體迷路了。

sentences.english: Going straight with this ridiculous world and stumble over this lonely world, finally they meet at the jail….
sentences.chinese: 在這個荒誕而寂寞的世界中一路前行，跌跌撞撞。

sentences.english: Will I feel sad when I continue my journey alone?
sentences.chinese: 讓我孓然孤獨地前行，我會悲傷嗎？

sentences.english: Saturn, which can act as a handbrake at times, is now moving forward in your sign.
sentences.chinese: 土星有時就像手剎一樣，現在正在你的星座前行。

sentences.english: He got off at XiNing, while we kept moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 火車到達西寧，他離去，我們則繼續我們的前行。

sentences.english: You still at standing alone of ex- is all right?
sentences.chinese: 你依然在孤獨的前行嗎？

sentences.english: The good news is that we are moving forward with a sense of urgency equal to the challenge.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是我們在以足以應對挑戰的急迫感前行。

sentences.english: Here genuinely few tricks to help you hasong.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有幾個訣要助你前行。

sentences.english: Everybody says; “trust yourself”. Or; “go with your gut”.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都說“相信自己”或者“伴着勇氣前行”。

sentences.english: And need HIS strength to carry on.
sentences.chinese: 需要祂的力量來導我前行。

sentences.english: Vehicles need constant fill-up to make sure they move ahead ceaselessly.
sentences.chinese: 汽車要不斷地加油才能確保它不停的向前行駛。

sentences.english: Zhang Qishan according to the map to move forward, again meet the statue of Buddha old mother.
sentences.chinese: 張啓山按照地圖繼續前行，再次遇到天尊老母的雕像。

sentences.english: A waggoner was once driving a heavy load on a very muddy road.
sentences.chinese: 一名車伕趕着貨車沿着一條非常泥濘的小路前行。

sentences.english: Even if a long journey, I will follow the love you left, Keep on moving.
sentences.chinese: 即使路途遙遠，俺也會跟隨着你留下地愛，繼續前行。

sentences.english: Now it’s time to pull out the virtual surfboard and catch the wave.
sentences.chinese: 現在，就是拿出那個虛擬的衝浪板，馭浪前行之時了。

definition: to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
on the road/on a journey/road surface
see 一往無前|一往无前[yi1 wang3 wu2 qian2]
lit. to cut one's way through thistles and thorns (idiom)/fig. to overcome all obstacles on the way/to break through hardships/to blaze a new trail
to advance at a snail's pace
the whole journey/all the way/going the same way/going in the same direction/of the same kind
